question: I have both endometriosis and PCOS, and have been trying for 2 years to have a baby I have fallen pregnant several times and miscarried does any one know how to prevent miscarrying?Also my doctor has told me he wants me to take metmorfin which is a drug perscribed to diabetics, I don't have diabetes but I want to know if I start taking this drug do I have to take it for the rest of my life, and I stop will the risk of diabetes incrase?
title: Pregnancy?diabetes drugs?
